sentences.en: a synthesis of Eastern and Western philosophical ideas
sentences.cn: 东西方哲学思想的结合

sentences.en: All of the groups moved towards a broader eclecticism and synthesis.
sentences.cn: 所有的乐队都朝着更广泛的折衷主义和结合主义的方向前进。

sentences.en: All the chief difficulties crop up in the synthesis of the enone ( 1 ).
sentences.cn: 所有的主要难点都涌现在烯酮 ( 1 ) 的合成中.

sentences.en: At the same time that albumin and fetoprotein synthesis is extinguished.
sentences.cn: 同时白蛋白和甲胎蛋白的合成被熄灭.

sentences.en: During the climacteric may be a transient burst of RNA synthesis.
sentences.cn: 在转换时期的RNA合成可能有短暂的骤增.

sentences.en: His novels are a rich synthesis of Balkan history and mythology.
sentences.cn: 他的小说融合了大量巴尔干半岛的历史和神话故事。

sentences.en: It was analysis in the sense of Plato, who opposed to synthesis.
sentences.cn: 它就是柏拉图心目中所认为的分析法, (相对于综合法而言).

sentences.en: Removal of the inducer results in immidiate cessation of enzyme synthesis.
sentences.cn: 除去诱导物就会立即终止酶的合成.

sentences.en: The damaged chloroplasts require the addition of ATP to fuel protein synthesis.
sentences.cn: 已破坏的叶绿体需要加入ATP以提供合成蛋白质的能量.

sentences.en: The published synthesis uses different methods of reduction in the two cases.
sentences.cn: 已发表的文献中对这两种情况使用了不同的还原方法.

sentences.en: the synthesis of art with everyday life
sentences.cn: 艺术与日常生活的结合

sentences.en: They act at least a temporary block to DNA synthesis in micro - organisms.
sentences.cn: 它们在微生物中至少对DNA合成起暂时性的阻止作用.

sentences.en: They act at least a temporary block to DNA synthesis in microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 它们在微生物中至少对DNA合成起暂时性的阻止作用。

sentences.en: This kind of lighting encourages vitamin D synthesis in the skin.
sentences.cn: 这种光照会促进皮肤中维生素D的合成。

sentences.en: We are now in a position to attempt a provosional synthesis.
sentences.cn: 我们现在可以探讨一下暂时的综合.

sentences.en: We made a synthesis of their studies.
sentences.cn: 我们综合分析了他们的研究报告.

trans.tran_cn: 综合，<化>合成，综合体，综合推理
trans.tran_en: something that has been made by combining different things, or the process of combining things
